65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:28): then the issue stays RAISED and someone has to make a Change Proposal (presumably not the person who first raised it)
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:28): the co-conspirator escalates an issue, fails to produce a proposal and the issue gets closed and deferred to the next version of HTML
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:28): amicable resolution does not apply if somebody objects, but then it's up to them to drive the issue
